Headline: #81W West Lawrence Temporary Reroute at The Pavillion Apartments
ShortDescription: #81W buses are temporarily rerouted via East River Road, Catalpa, and Delphia Avenue due to construction near The Pavillion Apartments.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#81W West Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via East River Road, Catalpa, and Delphia Avenue due to construction near The Pavillion Apartments.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Cicero
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Cicero due to door a problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Cicero due to door a problems.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
